asChild.description: Merges its props onto its immediate child.

colorScheme.type: ColorScheme | [ColorScheme | { [x: string & {}]: ColorScheme | undefined; base?: ColorScheme | undefined; "2xl"?: ColorScheme | undefined; lg?: ColorScheme | undefined; md?: ColorScheme | undefined; sm?: ColorScheme | undefined; xl?: ColorScheme | undefined; }, ColorScheme | { ...; }] | { ...; }

behavior.description: Determines whether scrolling is instant or animates smoothly.

disabled.description: If `true`, the infinite scroll is disabled.

finish.type: string | number | bigint | boolean | ReactElement<unknown, string | JSXElementConstructor<any>> | Iterable<ReactNode> | ReactPortal | Promise<...>
finish.description: The infinite scroll area finish to use.

indexRef.description: Ref to a reset index function.

initialLoad.description: If `true`, invoke `onLoad` function for the first time.

loading.type: string | number | bigint | boolean | ReactElement<unknown, string | JSXElementConstructor<any>> | Iterable<ReactNode> | ReactPortal | Promise<...>
loading.description: The infinite scroll area loading to use.

onLoad.description: The callback invoked when trigger is intersect.

orientation.type: Orientation | [Orientation | { [x: string & {}]: Orientation | undefined; base?: Orientation | undefined; "2xl"?: Orientation | undefined; lg?: Orientation | undefined; md?: Orientation | undefined; sm?: Orientation | undefined; xl?: Orientation | undefined; }, Orientation | { ...; }] | { ...; }
orientation.description: The orientation of the infinite scroll.

resetRef.type:
RefObject<
  (index?: number | undefined, runScroll?: boolean | undefined) => void
>

rootMargin.description:
Margin around the root. Can have values similar to the CSS margin property,
e.g. "10px 20px 30px 40px" (top, right, bottom, left).

rootRef.description:
The element that is used as the viewport for checking visibility of the target.
Defaults to the browser viewport if not specified or if `null`.

startIndex.description:
If set the `onLoad` function will start from the given index.
If `initialLoad` is `true`, index starts from `0`.

threshold.description: Either a single number or an array of numbers which indicate at what percentage of the target's visibility the observer's callback should be executed.

triggerProps.description: Props for infinite scroll area trigger component.
